argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grplact.1 | |- F = ( g e. X |-> ( a e. X |-> ( g .+ a ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | grplact.2 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grplact.3 | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_grplactcnv | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( F ` A ) : X -1-1-onto-> X /\ `' ( F ` A ) = ( F ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( F ` A ) : X -1-1-onto-> X ) |
